actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Public Buildings and Grounds.

actions.text: Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Public Works + Transportation
actions.text: Ordered to be Reported (Amended) by Voice Vote.
Reported (Amended) by the Committee on Public Works + Transportation. H. Rept. 103-73.
Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 36.
Mr. Traficant moved to suspend the rules and pass the bill, as amended.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate.
On motion to suspend the rules and pass the bill, as amended Agreed to by voice vote.
The title of the measure was amended. Agreed to without objection.
Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

actions.committee: Committee on Environment and Public Works
actions.text: Received in the Senate and read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

actions.in_committee: Committee on Environment and Public Works
actions.text: Committee on Environment and Public Works. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.
Committee on Environment and Public Works. Reported to Senate by Senator Baucus without amendment. Without written report.
Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 490.
Passed Senate without amendment by Voice Vote.
Cleared for White House.
Message on Senate action sent to the House.
Presented to President.
Signed by President.
Became Public Law No: 103-285.

official_title: To redesignate the Federal building located on St. Croix, Virgin Islands, as the "Almeric L. Christian Federal Building".

summary.text: Designates the Federal building located on St. Croix, Virgin Islands, as the Almeric L. Christian Federal Building.

titles.title: To redesignate the Federal building located on St. Croix, Virgin Islands, as the "Almeric L. Christian Federal Building".
